SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileEntry.folderId, DLFileEntry.name) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFolder ON (DLFolder.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DLFileEntry.folderId, DLFileEntry.name) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry INNER JOIN DLFolder ON (DLFolder.folderId = DLFileEntry.folderId) WHERE (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND (DLFileEntry.userId = ?)
